articles.author: Andy Bailey
articles.title: 5 Things Thunder vs. Pacers NBA Finals Could Reveal About the Future of the League - Bleacher Report
articles.description: The NBA is a copycat league, so plenty of teams are likely looking at the 2025 NBA Finals between the Oklahoma City Thunder and Indiana Pacers for ideas of how to reshape their own rosters.
articles.content:
5 of 5We're also about to learn a lot more about the league's next dynasty. 
The NBA hasn't had one for a while. No team has repeated as champs since the Warriors in 2018.
Though OKC is far from th… [+1207 chars]
